comments:
Steps to reproduce:
1.New a library, add a joint data set
2.New a cascading parameter group, use the joint data set
3.New a report, extend libraray cascading parameter group
4.Preview

Expected result:
Data can be retrieved in cascading parameter group

Actual result:
HTTP 500 error

NPE from DTE API. 

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.setParameterBindings(PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.java:475)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.getResultSetQuery(PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.java:403)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.initializeResultClass(PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.java:155)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.access$4(PreparedJointDataSourceQuery.java:150)

	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedQuery.doPrepare(PreparedQuery.java:372)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedDataSourceQuery.execute(PreparedDataSourceQuery.java:147)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.PreparedDataSourceQuery.execute(PreparedDataSourceQuery.java:127)

DtE part has been fixed. Catch the NPE and throw a DataException.

This bug is same as 155848. We have made a patch for bug Bugzilla Bug 151653 about JointDataSet. But issues remain. 

Now, the current problem is even more complicated than 15163 on joinCondition.dataSetName and JointDataSet.dataSetNames properties since library namespace involve. Need further discussion for this problem.
Looks library namespace causes this problem. The library should be transparent to the caller. Need to find a delicate solution for namespace issue.
Transfer to Data Team for fix
No error appears, but raise bug #158708
